name: Spiralcopter
description:
Welcome to Spiralcopter!

In this game, you must destroy enemy aircraft by entangling them with your rope.

There are three types of enemies you will encounter:

Planes - These will fly towards you whilst firing. Be sure to dodge their bullets!

Missiles - These will explode on contact

Pin Launcher - These enemies will launch sharp pins in multiple directions that will damage your helicopter.

Every time you get hit, you'll lose a life bar. Collect fuel canisters to regain life and keep going!

How to play:

You cannot fly straight into enemies. But by circling around them, they will get caught in your rope! The helicopter will follow the mouse. Alternatively, there is an option to use the arrow keys/WASD for movement.

Try to get the highest score without getting hit!

Made by McPepic for the Black & White Game Jam
